title: Public transport or walk to employment centre with 500 to 4999 jobs
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-transport
summary: Average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500 to 4999 jobs available by public transport or walking (experimental statistics), England, 2014-2019.
description:
This dataset shows the average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500 to 4999 jobs available by public transport or walking (experimental statistics), in England, for 2014-2019.

### Coverage 

England

#### Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities,
Metropolitan Counties,
Counties,
Regions,
Nation (England)

### Source

 - England: [Department for Transport](https://www.gov.uk/government/statistical-data-sets/journey-time-statistics-data-tables-jts) 


### Source Notes and Caveats 
Data is not available for 2018.

measure.label: Travel time to employment centre with 500 to 4999 jobs by public transport or walking
